channel.title: How do i ban on Phonescape source?
channel.description: please help me..check my other post and u'll know why i wanna know..[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 08:13:13 AM[/size][hr]its cuz everybody (the other admins-the other players) is kicking me. i've tried ::ban (username), ::ipban (username) and ::banip (username)... so, what should i do?

item.title: How do i ban on Phonescape source?
item.dc:creator: @DinoMan DinoMan
item.description:
@DinoMan wrote:

Phonescape source… Hmm… I’m pretty sure that source uses the command

::banuser INSERTNAMEHERE

Try that.

item.title: How do i ban on Phonescape source?
item.dc:creator: @Cyclops72 Cyclops72
item.description:
@Cyclops72 wrote:

Go in your data folder and make a new notepad called “bannedips” and then you put the ip there file and save and ur done
